context.name: BSA R-10 SE Super Carbine .177 Black Air Rifle
context.excerpt: The BSA R-10 SE Super Carbine .177 Air Rifle is a pre-charged pneumatic rifle, a fabulous air rifle and quite possibly the best that BSA has made to date.
context.content:
The BSA R-10 SE Super Carbine .177 Air Rifle is a pre-charged pneumatic rifle, a fabulous air rifle and quite possibly the best that BSA has made to date. Providing up to 25% more shots per charge than its predecessor. The R-10 SE Super Carbine fires up to 250 shots per charge.

 

BSA R-10 Exploded View Animation

 

BSA R-10 SE Super Carbine .177 Air Rifle Features

Fully regulated PCP rifle achieving consistent and dependable accuracy
Detatchable buddy bottle delivering up to 250 shots per fill
Adjustable butt pad
Fully adjustable 2 stage trigger
Pressure gauge and “on rifle” quick fill system
New self-actuating magazine system
Enhanced trigger function for total shot control

 

BSA R-10 SE Super Carbine .177 Air Rifle Specifications:

Overall Length 94cm / 37in
Barrel Length 30cm / 12in
Weight 3.1kg / 6.13lb
Calibre .177
Shots Per Fill ~190
Max Muzzle Velocity - ft/s (m/s) 825 (251)
Fill Pressure - bar ~232
